name: devops-real-app
description: Real test management application with server-side execution

scripts.build: npm install && cd server && npm install --production && cd ../client && npm install && cd ../client && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:unit:client && npm run test:unit:server
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:api && npm run test:e2e
scripts.lint: npm run lint:client && npm run lint:server
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:client && npm run typecheck:server

author: SoftDeploy
